medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 days prior to admission, characterized by right lower quadrant pain accompanied by nausea and non-bilious vomiting. There were no fever or chills. No changes in bowel habits or urinary symptoms were reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hyperlipidemia, rheumatoid arthritis (on Humira), previous right total knee replacement.
